meanings.sent1: The professor received an august award for his groundbreaking research.
meanings.sent2: The grand castle stood in all its august glory, overlooking the valley.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to act august by sitting on the throne made of pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her august presence commanded attention wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The majestic mountain range was an august sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The eighth month of the year, in the northern hemisphere usually considered the last month of summer
meanings.sent1: In August, the family went on a vacation to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The harvest festival is held every August in the village square.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels were busy gathering nuts for the upcoming august winter.
meanings.sent4: The heat in August was unbearable, making everyone long for cooler days.
meanings.sent5: August brought with it the vibrant colors of autumn, signaling the change of seasons.
